languages.text: {n}Ксенос змеиным движением поворачивается к Ирлиэт.{/n} "Одна из моих мягкотелых родичей. Какой подачкой тебя прикормили, раз ты опустилась до сопровождения этих животных? Или их компания напоминает тебе об обществе твоих потерянных братьев и сестер?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос змеиным движением поворачивается к Ирлиэт.{/n} "Одна из моих мягкотелых родичей. Какой подачкой тебя прикормили, раз ты опустилась до сопровождения этих животных? Или их компания напоминает тебе об обществе твоих потерянных братьев и сестер?"

languages.text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос змеиным движением поворачивается к Ирлиэт.{/n} "Одна из моих мягкотелых родичей. Какой подачкой тебя прикормили, раз ты опустилась до сопровождения этих животных? Или их компания напоминает тебе об обществе твоих потерянных братьев и сестер?"

traits.locale_text: "What if the answer is right in front of me?" {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

"What if the answer is right in front of me?" {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

{n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

{n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

{n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

languages.text: {n}彼は蛇のような動きでユリエットの方へ振り返った。{/n}「我が同胞ではないか。どんな貧弱な供物に誘惑されて、このような下等生物に会いに来た？それとも、奴らと一緒にいると失った兄弟や姉妹といた時のことを思い出すのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は蛇のような動きでユリエットの方へ振り返った。{/n}「我が同胞ではないか。どんな貧弱な供物に誘惑されて、このような下等生物に会いに来た？それとも、奴らと一緒にいると失った兄弟や姉妹といた時のことを思い出すのか？」

languages.text: {n}他像蛇一样转向伊莉耶特。{/n}“我软弱的同胞啊，到底是什么微不足道的原因，竟让你自降身份来照顾这些猴子？还是说，他们的陪伴让你想起了你失散的兄弟姐妹？”
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他像蛇一样转向伊莉耶特。{/n}“我软弱的同胞啊，到底是什么微不足道的原因，竟让你自降身份来照顾这些猴子？还是说，他们的陪伴让你想起了你失散的兄弟姐妹？”

languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

languages.text: {n}Se gira hacia Yrliet como una serpiente.{/n} «Una de mis primas de cuerpo suave. ¿Qué lamentable ofrenda te ha tentado a rebajarte a cuidar de estos animales? ¿O es que su compañía te recuerda a la de los hermanos y hermanas que has perdido?».
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Se gira hacia Yrliet como una serpiente.{/n} «Una de mis primas de cuerpo suave. ¿Qué lamentable ofrenda te ha tentado a rebajarte a cuidar de estos animales? ¿O es que su compañía te recuerda a la de los hermanos y hermanas que has perdido?».

languages.text: {n}Comme un serpent, il se tourne vers Yrliet.{/n} « L'une de mes semblables à peau tendre. Quelle misérable offrande a bien pu vous convaincre de vous abaisser à servir ces animaux ? À moins que leur compagnie vous rappelle celle de vos frères et sœurs disparus ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme un serpent, il se tourne vers Yrliet.{/n} « L'une de mes semblables à peau tendre. Quelle misérable offrande a bien pu vous convaincre de vous abaisser à servir ces animaux ? À moins que leur compagnie vous rappelle celle de vos frères et sœurs disparus ? »

languages.text: {n}Mit einer schlangenartigen Bewegung wendet er sich Yrliet zu.{/n} "Eine aus meiner Weichkörper-Verwandtschaft. Welches magere Angebot hat Euch veranlasst, Euch auf die niedere Stufe dieser Tiere zu begeben? Oder erinnert ihre Gesellschaft Euch an Eure verlorenen Brüdern und Schwestern?"
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einer schlangenartigen Bewegung wendet er sich Yrliet zu.{/n} "Eine aus meiner Weichkörper-Verwandtschaft. Welches magere Angebot hat Euch veranlasst, Euch auf die niedere Stufe dieser Tiere zu begeben? Oder erinnert ihre Gesellschaft Euch an Eure verlorenen Brüdern und Schwestern?"

languages.text: {n}Zeno, âdeta bir yılan gibi hızla Yrliet'e dönüyor.{/n} "Yufka yürekli hısmım. Sana ne zıkkım vadedildi de bu hayvanlara bakıcılık yapacak kadar kendini düşürdün? Yoksa aralarındayken ailenin yanındaymış gibi bir hisse mi kapılıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to Yrliet in a snakelike motion.{/n} "One of my soft-bodied kin. What meagre offering tempted you to lower yourself to attending these animals? Or does their company remind you of being among your lost brothers and sisters?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno, âdeta bir yılan gibi hızla Yrliet'e dönüyor.{/n} "Yufka yürekli hısmım. Sana ne zıkkım vadedildi de bu hayvanlara bakıcılık yapacak kadar kendini düşürdün? Yoksa aralarındayken ailenin yanındaymış gibi bir hisse mi kapılıyorsun?"
